summary: Pricing/plan copy updates for Free plan (10 invoices/month) and dashboard usage denominator (3/10) are present in the shown diffs. Pro plan ₹299/month and unlimited invoices appear consistent in PricingPage, and file summaries indicate the same for LandingPage. However, several unrelated UI/layout/styling changes were also introduced that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed InvoiceCreator UI behavior: state dropdown now uses popper positioning with capped height (~3 items) plus scrolling to prevent overlap with adjacent columns.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest is only for pricing/plan copy consistency (Free 10 invoices/month; Pro ₹299/unlimited).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified global CSS for state select dropdown styling (max-height constraint, scrollbar styling) and print-specific CSS rules for invoice preview/PDF layout.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside pricing/plan copy scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated InvoicePreview responsive layout to prevent state text overlap and added word-wrapping for long content (PDF/export related).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside pricing/plan copy scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend/index.html with SEO meta tags, page title, and inclusion of html2pdf.js CDN script.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside pricing/plan copy scope.
